nodes.text: A double-towered business center overlooked a major plaza within Christophsis's capital city of Chaleydonia during the Clone Wars. The complex was comprised of two towers, one facing the north and the other situated to the south.

The two towers overlooked the main plaza of the city, and were an ideal place for the Grand Army of the Republic to ambush the battle droid army going through the plaza during the Battle of Christophsis. Anakin Skywalker and Clone Captain Rex were stationed in the north tower while General Obi-Wan Kenobi and Clone Commander Cody were stationed in the south tower. Kenobi's men reported that the droid army unexpectedly split into two.

Suddenly, battle droids swarmed the south tower, and the clones' positions were compromised. Skywalker and his men made their way into the south tower by using ascension cables in the gap between the two buildings, and the survivors proceeded to the extraction point on the roof of the building.
